comment: Too much off bugs Many accounts got NOTES option But till date I did not got that update At starting in beta program I got that NOTES option. But, after an update that NOTES option was disappeared
scenarios: Initially, the user received the "NOTES" option as part of a beta program.
After an update, the "NOTES" option disappeared from the user's app.
key sentence: After an update, the "NOTES" option disappeared from the user's app.
